about_the_game:
SuuubWaaay is a single-player sci-fi horror game full of mysteries and monsters. You play as a detective investigating the closed yet unsolved case of the famous SuuubWaaay incident in 1991 but you end up going a little too deep. You now must defend yourself against the creatures inside the SuuubZone-how the SuuubWaaay gets around. Your main mission is to find the missing components while avoiding the creatures that are guarding them. When the machine is completed you should be able to reopen a SuuubZone and head back home. Although you should not worry, you are not alone! There are other survivors of the incident inside with you. They are counting on you to release them from the SuuubZone. Do not let them down.

TOOLS! USE THEM

Because of your past as a detective, you can use your tools to inspect and discover clues that may hold valuable information to solve puzzles or get you out of the SuuubZone. The tools are tape, a lighter, your bare hands, and more.

THE SUUUBWAAAY
The SuuubWaaay was the most popular form of transportation! It looked like your average New York Subway, but it was waaay more! With the SuuubWaaay, you could go anywhere within minutes! Unfortunately, something went wrong one day, it arrived at the designated location damaged, and everyone on board was gone.

THE SUUUBZONE
The SuuubZone. This is where the SuuubWaaay goes into and comes out of, this is how the SuuubWaaay gets around—designed by Sub Williams, the founder of the SuuubWaaay. Unfortunately, it malfunctioned one day and this is where you, and many others, are trapped inside.

THE CREATURES

Lurking in every shadow and corner of the SuuubZone are creatures. These creatures have inhabited the SuuubZone since the malfunction, now you must use the gadgets against these creatures you may encounter.

THE GADGETS
Made by other people, designed to help people like you. There are multiple of these gadgets that you will find throughout the SuuubZone. Use these gadgets wisely though, the battery life isn't longer than 3 minutes usually. If the gadgets lose battery while next to a creature... may God be with you.

name: SuuubWaaay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-5005U CPU @ 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4770K CPU @ 3.50GHz 3.50 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: Progress through the SuuubZone, a gateway between universes and time, to solve the case of the 1991 SuuubWaaay incident. Use your past experience as a detective to find clues and to survive in this sci-fi horror game.
